title: Last Days: Hype Or Hope? Movie
creator: EZ Takes

extendedInfo.description: Is Bible prophecy really being fulfilled in this generation? Could Armageddon and the end of the age be just around the corner? Skeptical investigative reporter Steve Stone sets out to find the truth in this incredible new docu-drama. Carefully analyzing ...more at www.eztakes.com. (Duration: 60 Minutes)
